title: More than 1,000 MCAS essays scored incorrectly due to AI mishap
description: Approximately 1,400 MCAS essays were incorrectly scored after an artificial intelligence grading mishap, according to DESE.
content:
The temporary technical issue impacted an average of one or two students' scores in each of the 145 affected districts.
Approximately 1,400 MCAS essays were scored incorrectly due to an AI-grading mishap, according to the state Department of Elementa... [2092 chars]

title: Nokia Hires Intel Executive To Lead Push Into AI Data Centers
description: Nokia Oyj has created a new artificial intelligence department and hired a former Intel Corp. executive to lead a push into the technology, as part of a strategic shift under new Chief Executive Officer Justin Hotard.
content:
Nokia Oyj has created a new artificial intelligence department and hired a former Intel Corp. executive to lead a push into the technology, as part of a strategic shift under new Chief Executive Officer Justin Hotard.

title: Nvidia Shares Are Slipping Wednesday: What's Going On?
description: Nvidia shares are trading lower Wednesday after China banned its leading technology companies from procuring the company's artificial intelligence (AI) chips.
content:
NVIDIA Corporation NVDA shares are trading lower Wednesday after China reportedly banned its leading technology companies from procuring the company’s artificial intelligence (AI) chips.

title: Is the internet’s next chapter making us lonelier?
description: The Ethical Life podcast: Artificial intelligence now helps mediate many of our daily choices. The hosts weigh benefits against spirals of self-harm content, weak oversight and profit incentives that reward engagement over human well-being.
content: Episode 212: Artificial intelligence has quickly moved from science fiction to everyday life, embedded in chatbots, search engines and social media feeds that billions of people use daily. Tech companies tout these tools as helpful assistants — capab... [2968 chars]
